nodes.text: The Enclave was a settlement that was founded by the Jedi Master Vhiin Thorla as a home for liberated slaves, just before the Clone Wars.

Located on Ryloth, it was roughly a two day walk into the Bright Lands from the village of Bashka. Master Thorla took the security of The Enclave very seriously and took several measures to ensure this security, such as building a solid wall of rock around the hidden entrance and building The Enclave into the natural caverns and hand-carved chambers of the Bright Lands' mountainous landscape. Under the protection of Master Thorla The Enclave reached, at its height, a population of three dozen beings.
